output.stdout:
homey.js <command>

Commands:
  homey.js app       App related commands
  homey.js docs      Open Homey Developer Documentation
  homey.js list      List all Homeys
  homey.js login     Log in with an Athom account
  homey.js logout    Log out the current user
  homey.js select    Select a Homey as active
  homey.js tools     Open Homey Developer Tools
  homey.js unselect  Unselect the active Homey
  homey.js whoami    Show the current logged in user

Options:
  --version  Show version number                                       [boolean]
  --help     Show help                                                 [boolean]

homey.js app

App related commands

Commands:
  homey.js app add-github-workflows  Add GitHub Workflows (validate, update
                                     version, publish)
  homey.js app add-types             Install the Apps SDK TypeScript
                                     declarations
  homey.js app build                 Build a Homey App for publishing
  homey.js app compose               Migrate app to Homey compose
  homey.js app create                Create a new Homey App
  homey.js app discovery             Discovery related commands
  homey.js app driver                Driver related commands
  homey.js app flow                  Flow related commands
  homey.js app install               Install a Homey App
  homey.js app manage                View your app in the Homey Developer Tools
  homey.js app publish               Publish a Homey App to the Homey Apps Store
  homey.js app run                   Run a Homey App in development mode
  homey.js app translate             Translate a Homey App with OpenAI
  homey.js app validate              Validate a Homey App
  homey.js app version <next>        Update a Homey App's version
  homey.js app view                  View your app in the Homey App Store
  homey.js app widget                Widget related commands

Options:
      --version  Show version number                                   [boolean]
  -p, --path     Path to a Homey App directory
                           [string] [default: "C:\Users\HP\Desktop\tuya_repair"]
      --help     Show help                                             [boolean]
